类 AllStation

      • AllStation

        public AllStation()
        Initialize and read all the stations from the file

    • 方法详细资料

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] arg)

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize()
        Read all the stations from the file
        返回:
        If read the file successfully, return true; if not return false.

      • getAllStation

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllStation()
        Get all the stations
        返回:
        List of all the stations

      • addStation

        public int addStation(java.lang.String Station)
        Add a new station
        参数:
        Station - Name of station to be added
        返回:
        if success, return 1; if not return 0.

      • nameExist

        public boolean nameExist(java.lang.String name)
        Determine whether the station with a certain name exits
        参数:
        name - the name to query
        返回:
        If such station exits, return true; if not, return,false.

      • removeStation

        public boolean removeStation(java.lang.String name)
        Delete a station
        参数:
        name - Name of the station to be deleted.
        返回:
        If success, return true; if can not find this station, return false.
